job_tasks.phrase: define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology (both from a creative tooling & pipeline perspective and our end-user software)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activities of building and maintaining software systems, including the development of creative tooling and end-user software, which aligns with the definition of traditional software engineering tasks.
This phrase refers to the development of tools and pipelines, which are software components, fitting the definition of building and integrating software.

job_tasks.phrase: Guiding and make pipeline technology choices
job_tasks.justification: This involves technical decision-making and leadership in defining the direction of software development, which is part of the broader software engineering process.

job_tasks.phrase: define the future architecture of our technology platform
job_tasks.justification: Defining the architecture is a fundamental software engineering task related to the design and structure of software systems.
This refers to technical planning and strategy within the development context, aligning with the collaborative aspects of software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: develop the tools and automation they need
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes the creation of software tools and automation, which are core software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline
job_tasks.justification: This phrase outlines the software development lifecycle activities (build, test, deploy) applied to a pipeline, which is a type of software system.

job_tasks.phrase: pick up enhancements and implement directly
job_tasks.justification: This refers to taking on and executing new development tasks, a fundamental aspect of software engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration with various teams, indicating a need for strong interpersonal and teamwork skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the importance of working closely with technical teams, a key aspect of collaboration.
This indicates collaboration with non-technical stakeholders (artists) to understand and fulfill their needs, requiring effective communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Document and possibly train artists to use the pipeline
soft_skills.justification: Documenting and training others are direct forms of communication and knowledge sharing, essential for collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses entirely on software development, pipeline engineering, architecture, and collaboration within a technical and artistic context. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related tasks. All identified tasks fall under 1.A.1. Software Development & Integration.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is clear, concise, and directly describes software engineering responsibilities without any ambiguity or mention of AI/ML.
